name: test_post_body_negative[restore_POST_negative_Drop fields with Required=True]
description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

testStage.description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

steps.name: Assert - All fields without body checks - Missing in request: name, timeout, backup_id
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - name: ['The name field is required.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - timeout: ['The timeout field is required.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - backup_id: ['The backup id field is required.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
